data.actual_result: The message, embed, link or code block is above the message looking like the previous person sent the message System Settings: Android 6.0, Sony Xperia M5
data.expected_result: Show the message, embed, link or code block under the message
data.short_description: Embeds, links and code blocks appear above a users message in the chat preview via mentions
data.steps_to_repro: - Send an message, embed, link or code block and mention yourself in the same message with another account - Preview the mention with the mentioned account
